mapper.insert: insert into QUIZ_INFO (NUM,CHATROOM_NUM,MAKER_NUM, SUBJECT_NUM,QUIZ_TYPE,QUESTION, OPTION1,OPTION2,OPTION3, OPTION4,OPTION5,ANSWER, EXPLANATION,NUM_OF_QUIZ,NUM_OF_ANSWERS) values (QUIZ_NUM_SEQ.nextval,#{chatroomNum},#{makerNum}, #{subjectNum},#{quizType},#{question}, #{option1},#{option2},#{option3}, #{option4},#{option5},#{answer}, #{explanation},#{numOfQuiz},#{numOfAnswser})
mapper.select: select SINFO.SUBJECT_NUM, SINFO.SUBJECT, STR.NUM as chatroom_num, STR.ROOMNAME as room_name from MATCHTABLE MAT join STUDYROOM STR on (MAT.CHATROOM_NUM=STR.NUM) join SUBJECT SINFO on (STR.SUBJECT_NUM=SINFO.SUBJECT_NUM) where MEMBER_NUM=#{member_num}
mapper.update: update QUIZ_INFO set NUM_OF_QUIZ=NUM_OF_QUIZ+1 where NUM=#{num}
update QUIZ_INFO set NUM_OF_ANSWERS=NUM_OF_ANSWERS+1 where NUM=#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*,STR.ROOMNAME,SUB.SUBJECT as SUBJECT_NAME, MEM.NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY NUM DESC)AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM QUIZ_INFO WHERE 1=1
)A ) A JOIN MEMBER MEM ON (MEM.NUM=A.MAKER_NUM) JOIN STUDYROOM STR ON (STR.NUM=A.CHATROOM_NUM) JOIN SUBJECT SUB ON (SUB.SUBJECT_NUM=A.SUBJECT_NUM) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUIZ_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND NUM > 0
